tooltip.born_in_spellbooks.phantom_split: Evade One Hit and Summon a Phantom Double with %d Explosion Radius
spell.born_in_spellbooks.curse.guide: Mark a target with a curse. When the time is up, scarlet persecutors will be summoned to kill them.
spell.born_in_spellbooks.ritual.guide: Sacrifice a summoned mob to gain back health along with gaining resistance, regeneration, and a health boost.
spell.born_in_spellbooks.lingering_stain: Explode a summoned mob to leave behind a blood soaked stain that damages entities in it. The more health of the sacrifice, the longer the stain will last.
spell.born_in_spellbooks.summon_skeleton: Bring back to life a Skeleton Thrasher that obeys your command.
spell.born_in_spellbooks.summon_zombie_b: Bring to life a Zombie Bruiser that obeys your command.
spell.born_in_spellbooks.malevolent_shri: Cast a domain that launches blood slashes onto anything inside of it. While in your domain you get resistance and strength, and other entities get weakness and slowness.
spell.born_in_spellbooks.blind.guide: Shoot a piece of a Dark Vortex that inflicts blindness and knocks back the target
spell.born_in_spellbooks.death_wish.guid: Become a living bomb and set a fuse on yourself. When the time is up you explode dealing massive AOE damage but also damaging yourself.
Harness the power of a nightmare stalker and unleash a clawed attack that inflicts wither and gaze of terror.
spell.born_in_spellbooks.phantom_split.g: Dodge one attack and split in two with a phantom double. This double will chase down whatever inflicted the damage and explode when its time is up
spell.born_in_spellbooks.swarm.guide: Blow rotten breath that damages targets and inflicts rotten stench and hunger.
spell.born_in_spellbooks.summon_dread_ho: Become the alpha you always were. Summon a pack of wolves that will protect and obey your command
spell.born_in_spellbooks.shoot_maggot.gu: Have an arsenal of maggots that you are able to shoot that inflict poison on the target or aid you in battle.
spell.born_in_spellbooks.infect_host.gui: Release a Bloody Gadfly to a target to infect maggots into it. When hit, summons 3 maggots that aid you.
Shoot a pumpkin that damages targets, once on the ground it turns into a Pumpkin Friend. When the Pumpkin Friend dies it explodes with a 5 block radius.
spell.born_in_spellbooks.great_glutton.g: Paralyze an enemy and open an ocean portal beneath them. A Glutton Fish will appear out of the portal and damage the target.
spell.born_in_spellbooks.infernal_bolt.g: Shoot a small infernal bolt that damages an entity and applies infernal flame on it.
spell.born_in_spellbooks.infernal_bomb.g: Launch a Fel Soil bomb that explodes on contact and leaves behind an infernal flame filed that deals DOT and inflicts infernal flame.
Shoot an explosive arrow that inflicts infernal flame on contact. If it hits the ground, it leaves behind an infernal flame field.
spell.born_in_spellbooks.stun.guide: Stomp on the ground, stunning nearby enemies while also doing damage
spell.born_in_spellbooks.spiritual_exper: Leave your physical body behind and become a spirit where nothing can hurt you, but you can't hurt anything too. When your time is up, teleport back to your physical body.
